name: DecisionMaker
0:
”Alexa, ask decision maker what I should eat today”
”Alexa, ask decision maker what I should wear today”
”Alexa, ask decision maker what movie I should watch today”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: decision maker
des: With the Decision Maker skill, users can get help deciding on what kind of cuisine to eat that day, assistance on what color scheme to wear, or movie genre to watch that day. More decisions are to be added in future updates.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
